summary:
I am highly motivated and enthusiastic Specialist Geoscientist with a proven track record of project delivery with exceptional technical capabilities and integrity.  I have deep and diverse skill-set being recognized as Shell subject matter expert in Stratigraphy. I develop multi-scale stratigraphic frameworks with a holistic source2sink approach to provide integrated petroleum systems results. 
Wide experience with diverse multi-disciplinary, multi-national teams, internal and external stakeholder engagements; project and data management.
I am passionate about coaching, mentoring and teaching of junior staff to ensure positive working atmosphere and personal progression within my team.

Prepare and conduct and assure integrated studies throughout the rock record and also modern-day surface samples and piston cores in support of offshore geotechnical, environmental baseline surveys, and geochemical “seep hunting” surveys.
SME Isotopes and Chemostratigraphy. I apply and integrate all techniques available to provide multi-scale reservoir and seal evaluations for Production teams as well as frontier and heartland exploration opportunities globally.  Expert in biostratigraphy and develop novel and innovative solutions (Astrochronology, Geochronology, Isotopes, source2sink workflows), engaging with the relevant external and internal thought leaders to champion basin analyses and maximize global impact across Exploration and Production. Coach and mentor to junior staff and interns. 

Projects: Western Black Sea, deep-water Nigeria; Wilcox and Norphlet Plays Gulf of Mexico; Campeche, Mexico-Guatemala-Honduras; South Atlantic Margins (Santos, Campos, Kwanza; Gabon, Congo, Namibia; Guyana-Suriname and equatorial Guinea); Oman; North Sea; offshore Myanmar and various others.', 'title': 'Senior Stratigrapher', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Shell Bellaire Technological Centre, Houston', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Shell', 'description': 'Lead researcher in global source rocks; SME in mudrock stratigraphy and sedimentology. Integrated sedimentological, geochemical and stratigraphic support to Unconventional Business including Eagle Ford, Macellus, Utica, Mexico/GoM plays for sweet-spot prediction. Coordinate and quality assurance of  external national and international research programs and studies, lead instructor in field courses and intern mentor. Extensive outcrop and field experience.', 'title': 'Senior Stratigrapher Exploration Research', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Aberdeen, United Kingdom', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'company': 'Shell', 'description': 'providing general geological and specialist biostratigraphic, chemostratigraphy and seismic-sequence support for regional Exploration, Development. Responsible for well operations stratigraphy for UK North Sea, West of Shetlands, Norway and Greenland including offshore contractors and HSE and well delivery. 
Technical assurance for Exploration licensing rounds. European contract holder for Biostratigraphic and Chemostratigraphic contractors responsible for auditing of laboratories and HSSE practices, technical assurance of contractors and experienced in contract tenders. Responsible for quality of corporate pick database and integration of stratigraphic data.
